We have flood alerts across parts of north, north-east and south-west London... flooding is possible...

More details and advice for ALL areas on the flood information pages of https://t.co/XbWcHLcKz6: https://t.co/64gyL6kvPd

Stay #floodaware #weather #StormAlex https://t.co/yU4okAzo00

tweets.text:
Our field teams are working hard checking #flood defences and clearing screens in preparation for heavy rain and high winds this weekend. 

Be prepared. Check https://t.co/ce9vZ9i1P3 or call Floodline on 0345 988 1188 for the latest flood updates. https://t.co/YIvgKbK9PE

Just 6 months after admitting to 8,400 pollution incidents in court @SouthernWater still manage to top the 2019 polluter in chief scoreboard.

What's clear is the @EnvAgency has no control over this company and even clearer, it is now time for @Ofwat to revoke SW's licence. https://t.co/1KqXjd6XYE

tweets.text: The @EnvAgency's report into the environmental performance of water companies is released today. You can read the press release, my foreword and the full report here:  https://t.co/mwr4EUcpjm

One of the frequent ways we prevent flooding ahead of storms is make sure rivers are clear of blockages and flowing nicely...

Like here today in #Surrey ‚¨áÔ∏è... but not just Surrey; our teams are doing this work across the country #floodaware #StormAlex https://t.co/KSPvb62m6V

urls.title: Why water companies need to improve their environmental performance

tweets.text:

Read more on the blog, including @EmmaHowardBoyd's statement on what action needs to be taken üëá

https://t.co/fkwItn2LQb
@EnvAgency

High winds and heavy rain could cause surface water and river flooding over the weekend. Do not try to drive through floodwater. Be prepared. For the latest updates see
https://t.co/G0SjP0XBX4, or call Floodline on 0345 988 1188.

Join us on the 4th December to discuss #Flood and #CoastalErosion risk management? Speakers include @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @floodre @simonpic78 @InnesThomson @NatFloodForum @fayflood @AECOM @DrFox_Tim & @unitedutilities
